title: # 291 - Brendan Schaub & ME
description:
I sit down with Brendan Schaub in the mancave to talk about dieting, cars/houses, writing comedy, therapists, and much more!

Check out Brendan on "The Fighter and the Kid" podcast and "Below the Belt" on Showtime.

This episode is brought to you by Omaha Steaks. Go to www.omahasteaks.com and type “Bert” in the search bar for 78% off of the fathers day package today. 

This episode is also brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. To get started for just $5 go to www.forhims.com/bertcasted
